lead_paragraph: Pardip Saini, sentenced in a case involving inside information obtained by a former UBS employee, failed to repay profits related to the trading.

headline.main: Trader Convicted of Insider Trading Receives More Prison Time

snippet: Pardip Saini, sentenced in a case involving inside information obtained by a former UBS employee, failed to repay profits related to the trading.
abstract: British regulators extend prison sentence of convicted insider trader Pardip Saini, citing his failure to repay money obtained as a result of the trading; Saini was one of six sentenced in 2012 for using information obtained by former UBS employee.
